title: Update Vagrant VMs and package ready for WinRM
body: I'd like to spin up VMs on demand with the latest versions of Selenium, but the vagrant VMs offered by Microsoft are out of date (newer versions can be downloaded from the modern.ie site), and don't offer WinRM for configuring without manual intervention.  Improve support for vagrant, and us testers can start to do cool things with testing IE and Edge!

comments.body: You can use ssh to connect in an unattended way, and activate WinRM. Often, you just have to change network type to not public. Enjoy!
